name: Holiday Brussels Sprouts & Apples
description: Keep this dish in your back pocket for a holiday veggie dish––it’s quick and doesn’t take up precious oven space, what more could you need?
preparation: Combine Brussels sprouts and seasoning in a Multipurpose Steamer.
Microwave on high, with lid on, for 6 min.
Remove lid and top with sliced apple. Cover and microwave for 2 more min.
Top with chopped walnuts and season to taste.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup rice or starchy veggies.
